name: Cars War
description:
NEW UPDATE = NEW GAME

VEHICLES FURY

is Sci Fi Vehicle Combat Simulation Online Multiplayer Game Drive the Sci Vi vehicle and destroy the enemy vehicle To win the match play with one of the Sci Vi vehicle available to your team and each vehicle has points of strength and weakness and each vehicle composite weapon and control your cars by the W,S,A,D key and direct your weapon towards the enemy team through the mouse

this game will take you behind enemy lines as a member of your team to destroy the enemy. With access to exclusive vehicles.

Key Features


*Online multiplayer

*11 SCI FI Vehicles

*NEW Multiplayer system

*in game chat
